about_the_game:
Tanling Notes - GUILING Xiaopi Guoyunchuan Quick Face Change (with 39999 Lingbi) DLC contains GUILING Xiaopi Guoyunchuan Quick Face Change Dress, accompanied by 39999 Lingbi.



The demon mask is lifted, and the world is still true.

Special End Animation with Skin Gift [Guoyun Sichuan Opera]


Face-changing in Sichuan Opera is like fire-spraying in Qin Opera. It is a special skill in shaping characters. It is a Romantic way to reveal the inner thoughts and feelings of the characters in Sichuan Opera.

Costume design refers to Shudichuan face-changing stunt performance.
